summary: Provides a backend implementation that integrates the TXI language model (via the py_txi library) into the Optimum Benchmark suite. It handles acquiring the model, initializing weights (including empty-weight loading and fast weight initialization), preparing inputs, configuring generation parameters, and executing forward passes to generate text or embeddings.
business_intent: Facilitates performance benchmarking and comparison of TXI-based language models for text generation and embedding workloads, enabling developers and researchers to evaluate speed, memory usage, and output quality within a standardized framework.
